name: Sora Takenouchi & Joe Kido
effect: [Start of Your Turn] If your opponent has a Digimon with no digivolution cards in play, gain 2 memory.[Your Turn] When you attack with a blue Digimon, you may suspend this Tamer to trash up to 2 digivolution cards from the bottom of 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
security_effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
